channel.title: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!
channel.description:
I've had this problem for a long while.
1# When I connect to a server, it logs me in then logs me out. 2# Moparscape 3.2 doesn't work at all. 3# 1# is Moparscape 4
I'm downloading 3.2 right now, gonna see if it works then. But, I need help. It never works! :(
My computer is a Windows Vista.
Thanks for the help

item.title: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @knight12374 knight12374
item.description:
@knight12374 wrote:

Well the working one is bombet scape. So lemme get this straight, I get their client thingymajig. Then I…? Put it in a folder or something?

Sorry, I know I’m stupid. So, no, it’s not simple enough.

Thank you very much.

Edit: I’ve downloaded the client to my desktop. Now I put it where?
Edit: I’m officially retarded. All I had to do was run it. Sorry.
I is derp.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!

item.title: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

knight12374:

okay by their client you mean the download version or something else? If so, I need a link and instructions on what to do, of which he did not provide.

Download Shady scape’s client from there status page simple enough?

Read full topic

item.source: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!

item.title: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @knight12374 knight12374
item.description:
@knight12374 wrote:

HAZAA!!! Finally found a server that works, but it froze >.< at least it didn’t log me out ahh well.

Anyway, if I were to do anything I need exact instructions. That’s the way my mind works. So if u want me to do something, it would be much appreciated if you put exact instructions. Thanks.

Update: Yeah, it freezes every time I log in, immediately…
Can you give me a server that works with 3.2, preferably downloaded version?
One that won’t freeze upon log-in?

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:

also read that http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=shadyscape.zapto.org

item.source: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!

item.title: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @knight12374 knight12374
item.description:
@knight12374 wrote:

I’m joining Shadyscape. I’m not stupid, of course I knew that.

On the downloaded 3.2 w/Aryan my own server works, however the logging in problem still stands, now for 3.2, too.
The IP is shadyscape.zapto.org and the port is 5555. It still does the log-in log-out thingy.

And I don’t know java so my own server is useless, unless someone can do the coding for me (unlikely).

Any suggestions now?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!

item.title: I need help: Moparscape doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Moparscape doesn’t have it’s own server, it does however give you a place to play your own server if it’s compatible with the moparscape client.

Read full topic
